name: df-ldil
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cldil, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(clh, cv(s0)), crab(s2, cfv(claut, cv(s0)), wral(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s3), cfv(cple, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cv(s3))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ LDil =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(LHyp ` s0)‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà(LAut ` s0)| ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà(Base ` s0),(s3[(le ` s0)]s1 ‚Üí(s2 ` s3)= s3))}))
comment: Define set of all lattice dilations. Similar to definition of dilation in [Crawley] p. 111. (Contributed by NM, 11-May-2012.)
